Description: Grammy-winner Lauryn Hill releases her solo debut album, a follow-up to the FugeesÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s The Score. Upon its release, The Miseducation of Lauryn Hill received rave reviews from music critics and debuted at number one on the Billboard 200 chart, selling 422,624 copies in its first week. It went on to sell over 19 million copies worldwide. At the 41st Grammy Awards, The Miseducation of Lauryn Hill earned her five Grammy Awards, including the award for Album of the Year.
